1397580.name: Eidols
1397580.description:
A Luminous World


Eidols is a multiplayer survival game set in a unique, alien-looking world. Explore through the bioluminescent flora, and fight the terrifying creatures lurking therein, in an attempt to survive long enough to explore the secrets hidden throughout the world.

Growth Path Depends On Your Actions


Your creature's abilities will grow naturally as you play, adapting to your playstyle. Depending on your actions, your creature can follow a vastly different evolutionary tree across mobility, survival, and predation.

Death Is Not The End


When one of many dangers out in the world manages to get an upper hand on you, you do not have to start from square one. Your creature's life will be evaluated by Harmony, providing buffs and special effects to those which she deems worthy or in need.

Join Others On Your Journey


You are not alone in this world, and you should make use of that! Join others as you try and figure out the world's secrets, or take out bosses that plague the land. Cooperation is encouraged, and those who sabotage their friends will not be left unpunished…

Uncover Remnants Of The Old World


Who is Harmony, and why does she watch over your cycle of resurrection? The mystery is for you to uncover…
